full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA GCIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BLZOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA CIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN BSKUL ZHING SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GIS RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM @006A *, ,GZHAN LA 'OD DANG PHAN PA BSAM PA SNYAM PAS SLEB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN RTEN BAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
